  • public class RailLogicVerticalSlopeUpsideDownB
extends RailLogicVerticalSlopeBase
    Handles rail logic of an upside-down slope with a vertical rail above it

      • get

        public static RailLogicVerticalSlopeUpsideDownB get(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace direction)
        Gets the sloped-vertical rail logic for the the sloped track leading upwards facing the direction specified

        Returns:

      • getPath

        public RailPath getPath()
        Description copied from class: RailLogic
        Obtains a path consisting of connected points along which Minecarts move using this rail logic. The point coordinates are relative to the coordinates of the rails block. This allows the rails path to be cached, since they are unlikely to change.
        Overrides:
        getPath in class RailLogic
        Returns:
        rails path
